title: Part A
stimulusHtml:
1 point is earned for the integrand

1 point is earned for the answer

Area= ∫ 0 S (f(x)−g(x))dx         = ∫ 0 S (1+sin(2x)− e x/2 )dx         =0.429 MathType@MTEF@5@5@@6BE5@

1 point is earned for correct limits in an integral in (a), (b), or (c)

The graphs of f and g intersect in the first quadrant at (S, T) = (1.13569, 1.76446).

title: Part B
stimulusHtml:
